>
[Dread Helm](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1976)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Aura" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=206" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Fear" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=68" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 63 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The faceplate of a dread helm has a fierce visage that magnifies the effects of fear. Concealed within is a reservoir that can hold a single [dread ampoule](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3292), which takes 3 Interact actions to install.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645))   **Requirements** A dread ampoule is installed in the helm; **Effect** The dread ampoule atomizes, creating a fear‑inducing mist that hangs around your face for 3 rounds. The mist grants an item bonus to [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) checks equal to the dread ampoule’s item bonus. The mist also deals mental damage equal to the dread ampoule’s splash damage to all creatures within a 5-foot [emanation](/Rules.aspx?ID=2387) other than you. The activation uses up the dread ampoule, and the helm can’t be activated again until a new one is installed.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Dread Helm
